Song.title: This Fathomless Love
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Steve and Vikki Cook © 1999 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [C#m B | A | C#m B | A]
Verse 1: Lord, what moved Your [C#m]heart{,} to love lowly [A]man Before any [E]star could herald Your [B]praise And why did You [C#m]come abasing Your[A]self Veiled in a [E]robe of frail human [B]clay? Why [F#m]would You, the pure{,} give Your [A]life for the vile The [F#m]innocent seeking the [A]guilty{,} to be recon[D]ciled[A]
Chorus: I [B]can’t compre[E]hend{,} this [B]fathomless [D]love I’m [A]gripped and a[E]mazed{,} at [B]what You have [D]done Why [A]would the [F#m]Adored{,} become the des[D]pised To bear all the [F#m]furious [A]wrath{,} that was [Bsus | B]mine? How [E]awesome this [B]myste[D]ry [A] Of Your [F#m]fathomless love [Bsus B] [ ]for [C#m (intro)]me.
Verse 2: Why would You a[C#m]dopt{,} and take as Your [A]own Those who had [E]crushed{,} Your one precious [B]Son Why mercy and [C#m]grace{,} towards Your ene[A]mies Your name they have [E]cursed{,} and Your throne they have [B]shunned O [F#m]how could You choose{,} to show [A]kindness to these The [F#m]ones who would mock You{,} and [A]hate You, The ones just like [D]me? [A]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 lord what moved your heart to love lowly man before any star could herald your praise and why did you come abasing yourself veiled in a robe of frail human clay why would you the pure give your life for the vile the innocent seeking the guilty to be reconciled chorus i cant comprehend this fathomless love im gripped and amazed at what you have done why would the adored become the despised to bear all the furious wrath that was mine how awesome this mystery of your fathomless love for me verse 2 why would you adopt and take as your own those who had crushed your one precious son why mercy and grace towards your enemies your name they have cursed and your throne they have shunned o how could you choose to show kindness to these the ones who would mock you and hate you the ones just like me

Arrangement.description: Arrangement from Songs For The Cross-Centered Life
Arrangement.text:
Intro: [C#m Bsus | A2 | C#m Bsus | A2]
Verse 1: [A2]Lord, what moved Your [C#m7]heart{,} to love lowly [A2]man Before any [E]star could herald Your [B]praise And why did You [C#m]come abasing Your[A]self Veiled in a [E]robe of frail human [Bsus B]clay? Why [F#m9]would You, the pure{,} give Your [Amaj7]life for the vile The [F#m9]innocent seeking the [A]guilty{,} to be recon[D2]ciled[A]
Chorus: I [B]can’t compre[E]hend{,} this [B]fathomless [D]love I’m [A2]gripped and a[E]mazed{,} at [B]what You have [D]done Why [A2]would the [F#m]Adored{,} become the des[D]pised To bear all the [F#m]furious [A]wrath{,} that was [Bsus | B]mine? How [E]awesome this [B/D#]myste[D]ry [A] Of Your [F#m]fathomless love [Bsus B] [ ]for [C#m (intro)]me.
Verse 2: [A2]Why would You a[C#m7]dopt{,} and take as Your [A2]own Those who had [E]crushed{,} Your one precious [B]Son Why mercy and [C#m]grace{,} towards Your ene[A]mies Your name they have [E]cursed{,} and Your throne they have [Bsus B]shunned O [F#m9]how could You choose{,} to show [Amaj7]kindness to these The [F#m9]ones who would mock You{,} and [A]hate You, The ones just like [D2]me? [A]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 lord what moved your heart to love lowly man before any star could herald your praise and why did you come abasing yourself veiled in a robe of frail human clay why would you the pure give your life for the vile the innocent seeking the guilty to be reconciled chorus i cant comprehend this fathomless love im gripped and amazed at what you have done why would the adored become the despised to bear all the furious wrath that was mine how awesome this mystery of your fathomless love for me verse 2 why would you adopt and take as your own those who had crushed your one precious son why mercy and grace towards your enemies your name they have cursed and your throne they have shunned o how could you choose to show kindness to these the ones who would mock you and hate you the ones just like me
